To log onto another computer, you need ssh.

ssh is installed by default on ubuntu machines. You run it from the command line like this: ssh user@ipaddress
how do i get the ip and usernames?
To get the ip, one way is to point your web browser to whatismyip.com. The username is just whatever you have set on there. Is the other computer running ubuntu/linux?
no, i think its winXP

You can log onto that using VNC. It will require a bit more setup. vncviwer should be on your ubuntu machine, you'll need to install UltraVNC or the like on the XP machine and set up a password. With VNC you actually see what is on the other computer's screen, but it is quite a bit slower than ssh.
